00042 const int NUM_INPUT_FILES = 10;
00043 
00044 SelectFilesEngine::Reg SelectFilesEngine::reg;

00046 SelectFilesEngine * SelectFilesEngine::FromBase(BaseEngine *engine)
00047 {
00048         if (engine != NULL && engine->getEngineName() == SelectFilesEngine::EngineName())
00049                 return (SelectFilesEngine *)engine;
00050         return NULL;
00051 }

00053 SelectFilesEngine::SelectFilesEngine() {
00054     defineOptions();
00055 }
00056 
00057 SelectFilesEngine::~SelectFilesEngine() {
00058 }
00059 
00060 void SelectFilesEngine::defineOptions() {
00061         defineOption("", "input-count", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00062                 "The number of input files.",
00063                 "");
00064 
00065         defineOption("", "out-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00066                 "The name of the output file.",
00067                 "");
00068 
00069         char selectInput[25];
00070         char inputFile[25];
00071 
00072         for (int i = 1; i <= NUM_INPUT_FILES; ++i)
00073         {
00074                 sprintf(selectInput, "select-input-%d", i);
00075                 sprintf(inputFile, "input-file-%d", i);
00076 
00077                 defineOption("", selectInput, PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00078                         "Indicates if the file should be included.",
00079                         "");
00080 
00081                 defineOption("", inputFile, PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00082                         "Name of the file.",
00083                         "");
00084         }
00085 }

00087 void SelectFilesEngine::defineStates() { }

00089 /**
00090  * Make sure that our options are sane. Call Err::errAbort if not.
00091  */
00092 void SelectFilesEngine::checkOptionsImp()
00093 {
00094         defineStates();
00095 
00096         // Sanity check the inputs
00097         string filecount = getOpt("input-count");
00098 
00099         int count = atoi(filecount.c_str());
00100 
00101         if (count == 0)
00102         {
00103                         Err::errAbort("Couldn't read input-count");
00104         }
00105 
00106         string outfile = getOpt("out-file");
00107 
00108         if (outfile.empty())
00109         {
00110                         Err::errAbort("out-file parameter value is missing");
00111         }
00112 
00113         char selectInput[25];
00114         char inputFile[25];
00115 
00116         for (int i = 1; i <= count; ++i)
00117         {
00118                 sprintf(selectInput, "select-input-%d", i);
00119                 sprintf(inputFile, "input-file-%d", i);
00120 
00121                 string selectInputValue = getOpt(selectInput);
00122                 string inputFileValue = getOpt(inputFile);
00123 
00124                 if (selectInputValue.empty())
00125                 {
00126                         string selectInputName(selectInput);
00127                         Err::errAbort("Missing expected parameter - " + selectInputName);
00128                 }
00129 
00130                 if (inputFileValue.empty())
00131                 {
00132                         string inputFileName(inputFile);
00133                         Err::errAbort("Missing expected parameter - " + inputFileName);
00134                 }
00135         }
00136 }
00137 
00138 /**
00139    This is the "main()" equivalent of the engine.
00140 */
00141 void SelectFilesEngine::runImp()
00142 {
00143         string outfilename = getOpt("out-file");
00144         ofstream outfile;
00145         Fs::aptOpen(outfilename, ios::out);
00146         outfile << "file" << endl;
00147 
00148         string filecount = getOpt("input-count");
00149         int count = atoi(filecount.c_str());
00150 
00151         char selectInput[25];
00152         char inputFile[25];
00153 
00154         for (int i = 1; i <= count; ++i)
00155         {
00156                 sprintf(selectInput, "select-input-%d", i);
00157                 string selectInputValue = getOpt(selectInput);
00158 
00159                 if (selectInputValue[0] == 'y' || selectInputValue[0] == 'Y')
00160                 {
00161                         sprintf(inputFile, "input-file-%d", i);
00162                         string inputFileValue = getOpt(inputFile);
00163 
00164                         outfile << inputFileValue << endl;
00165                 }
00166         }
00167 
00168         outfile.close();
00169 }
